creator: markt@apache.org
text:
I have tested this on the lastest 6.0.x code from trunk and I can't reproduce this. Neither can I see how any of the changes yet to be made to 6.0.x would impact this.

Although this issue is raised against TC6 on Windows, it appears you are using a 3rd party packaged Tomcat 5.5.20 on linux. I can't recall any difference between TC6 and TC5 that would account for this either.

It is hard to see how this happens. I suspect a configuration issue. Please use the users list to debug further.

As a first step you might want to test using an ASF Tomcat distribution as some 3rd party distributions have exhibited odd behaviour in the past.
